WorkItem.Description:
While trying to figure out why I couldn't get my equipped stats to match my in-game stats, I back-tracked all the way to untalented-unglyphed-no-gear and found that the base stats don't match between Rawr and the in-game values.  Here are the what I'm seeing in-game vs. what Rawr reports:

Stat   In-game Value   Rarw Value
Stamina           115                   120
Mastery            15%                  8%
Health        155346           155416
Mana         300000           240000
Crit                1.92%         -1.08%
Mana Regen   6214  
Combat Regen 6000          3000

Stats that Match:
Agility           91
Intellect       165 
Spirit           190
Spell Power  155 
Haste           0%
Hit                0%

Adding the talent, "Heart of the Wild", stamina and health diverge a little more
Stamina    121     127
Health    155,430   155,514
WorkItem.Summary: Tauren Balance Druid Base Stats don't match in-game values

Comments.Message: I thought I had responded to this earlier, but apparently I forgot.  I think a number of these issues are fixed, or at least, I couldn't reproduce them with respect to the mastery, spell crit, and mana ones.  The stamina one I am just fixing, and should be checked in momentarily.
